name: Cave Escape (itch) (MangoWorks)
description:
Your name is Billy nd you are a miner stuck in a cave and its your job to get him out but the cursed Halloween Skelton head woke up and he wants to eat you!

How to play:

1. use arrow keys to move 

2. avoid falling into the acid

3. collect the double jump powerup -    

4.collect the speed powerup - 

That's about it hope you have fun!
